page.title: 05EDUCATION
page.content: {HOBKIRK SCHOOL continued:}The original Hobkirk School,opened in 1857,was converted to two cottages when the present school was built.It was by the Parish Church and opposite the Schoolhouse ,which has now been sold too. {JEDBURGH GRAMMAR SCHOOL }is where most pupils go for secondary education, being taken by bus.A few prefer to attend {HAWICK HIGH SCHOOL.}There is complete freedom of choice in this. {SOUTHDEAN UNDER-FIVES CLUB }provides a playgroup for the two dozen or so pre-school children in the district,on two half-days a week. {HENDERSON TECHNICAL COLLEGE }in Hawick provides most Further Education.
